text: Gary Bettenhausen (November 18, 1941 - March 16, 2014) was an American auto racing driver. He was inducted in the National Sprint Car Hall of Fame in 1993. He was born in Blue Island, Illinois and was raised in Tinley Park, Illinois. Bettenhausen died on March 16, 2014 in Monrovia, Indiana. He was 72 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gary Bettenhausen at Racing Reference Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from Illinois
title: Gary Bettenhausen
